title: School tomorrow. X[
content:
Yeah, I'm really annoyed. Another year in school is about to begin. Luckily, this time I have 'only' to go for the 3/5 of the time I was there previous year, since this is my last year on that high school.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-birthday.gif[/img] I'm really happy gettin' out of that place. Too bad this year I have all the important exam stuff, the first of them in about one and a half month. I'm a bit stressed.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img]
Oh, and what makes it more annoying is that since my wisdom teeth from my lower jaw were taken out two days ago, I'm feeling quite annoying pain, and taking some medicine sometimes.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img] That also has the funny effect that my face has been "chipmunkized"; swollen quite a bit, so my face looks like I've got about 50kg more weight (or more) during the summer.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-pig.gif[/img] Although, it doesn't matter.[url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]

title: Re: School tomorrow. X[
content:
No school til september[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-birthday.gif[/img]

Still I guess I'm the only one here who had to work and do home studies his entire holidays, so don't think I'm that lucky.-----------------

content: I got all four wisdom teeth out 3 weeks ago...oddly enough I had no pain or swelling at all, so no funny pictures of me as a chipmunk.[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Re: School tomorrow. X[
content:
You were really lucky xtra.. Oh, and the reason they didn't take all my wisdom teeth is that the ones in my upper jaw are still quite deep so it would've been more difficult to get them and so on.. But they will be taken out in the future. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img]

"You lost me there KR. What do you mean?"
Well, I don't know how different the school systems are, but here we have thing called "writings" (freely translated), that are like exams, but a lot bigger and more important. Like in usual exam there is only stuff the course had, in these writings will be asked stuff from every course.. However, we can select the stuff that we answer, so we don't need to know about the other subjects we choose not to answer. This autumn I'm answering to history, philosophy, religion, and Swedish questions. On spring math, English, and Finnish.. (And them I'm outta there.)[url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]

i start school on Wednesday myself....

title: Re: :'-(
content: ahh i've been going to school since september and my summer semester of school just ended. work from 8am - 1 pm and then school from 2 pm to 8pm. And now it's just work until september comes around again. Work/school work school, the joys of life lol.

title: Re: :'-(
content:
Everyone complains about school! Moan, moan, moan, thats all I hear! You'd think they strap you down in a chair and use you as a dartboard for 6 hours a day the way you carry on.

My brother is working in a sewage treatment plant this semster, and not from a controll room either, now that is something to complain about.

I love school, it means I don't have to work. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-love.gif[/img] A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: :'-(
content:
"Everyone complains about school! Moan, moan, moan, thats all I hear! You'd think they strap you down in a chair and use you as a dartboard for 6 hours a day the way you carry on."
Well, it's because that sucks! (And since I'm not in any job I can't tell my stupid job sucks.)

"My brother is working in a sewage treatment plant this semster, and not from a controll room either, now that is something to complain about."
Ah, sounds great. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-love.gif[/img] [url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]

title: Re: :'-(
content: school is not the problem at all, i love what im doing in college. the hard part is going to school AND work to pay for school. School itself is hard but it's enjoyable, but going to work after/before school really takes the energy out of you.

title: Re: :'-(
content:
I have 3 weeks left till school starts. I am looking forward to going back to drama, programming, english, and trying out journalism. Though I still have so many rpgs to still go through.
